questions.prompt: Who was the first President of the United States?
questions.feedback: Correct! George Washington served as the first President of the United States from 1789 to 1797.
questions.subject: history

questions.prompt: In which year did World War II end?
questions.feedback: Excellent! World War II ended in 1945 with the surrender of Japan in September.
questions.subject: history

questions.prompt: The Great Wall of China was built in a single dynasty.
questions.feedback: Correct! The Great Wall was built and rebuilt by multiple dynasties over many centuries, not just one dynasty.
questions.subject: history

questions.prompt: Which ancient civilization built the pyramids?
questions.feedback: Perfect! The ancient Egyptians built the famous pyramids, including the Great Pyramid of Giza.
questions.subject: history

questions.prompt: The _____ Revolution began in 1775 when American colonists fought for independence.
questions.feedback: Correct! The American Revolution (1775-1783) was when the American colonies fought for independence from British rule.
questions.subject: history

metadata.title: History Highlights
metadata.description: Important events and figures from world and American history
